name: Shutting Down (MrOrry)
description:
This is my first ever “finished” “game”! It’s a simple visual novel about a computer that tries to shut down, but the red button is to darn shiny not to press. It’s really short, about 4-5 minutes with some light humor.

Share your highscore if you ever reach one :)

Also, don’t forget to extract the zip before launching the .exe! The .exe needs the .pck to be in the same folder.!
